mapper.select: select dl.*, e.emp_name, j.job_name from docline dl left join employee e on dl.approver = e.emp_no left join jobtitle j on e.emp_job = j.job_no where doc_no = #{doc_no} order by lv

select d.doc_no, d.title, e.emp_name writer_name, d.request_date, d.end_date, d.status from document d left join docline dl on d.doc_no = dl.doc_no left join employee e on dl.approver = e.emp_no where approver = #{id} and d.doc_no = #{docNo}

insert into document( doc_no, title, writer, content ) values( seq_doc_no.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content} )

insert into docline( doc_no, approver, approver_type, lv, status, max_authority ) values( #{docNo}, #{approver}, #{approverType}, #{lv}, #{status}, #{maxAuthority} )
